src:
Panjat Tebing: Aries Susanti Bersiap ke Pra Kualifikasi Olimpiade
05 Nov 2019, 16:55 by Antara, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Atlet panjat tebing perempuan Indonesia Aries Susanti Rahayu sedang mempersiapkan diri untuk mengikuti kejuaraan pra-kualifikasi Olimpiade 2020 Tokyo di Toulouse, Prancis pada 25 November mendatang.
Meskipun masih dalam tahap pemulihan akibat cedera jari tangan yang dideritanya sejak Oktober lalu, Aries menyatakan akan tetap tampil semaksimal mungkin pada pra-kualifikasi nanti.
"Sebenarnya pas kejuaraan kemarin (di Xiamen, China), sudah cedera. Tapi kalau kejuaraan ya udah maksimalin aja, keluarin," ujar perempuan yang dijuluki spiderwoman itu di Jakarta, Selasa.
Dalam mempersiapkan pra-kualifikasi ini, Aries mengatakan ia harus berlatih lebih giat apalagi dalam kejuaraan kali ini akan mempertandingkan nomor kombinasi speed, lead, dan boulder, sama seperti yang akan dipertandingkan pada Olimpiade 2020 Tokyo.
"Pastinya ya latihan sama tetap seperti kemarin, cuma lebih giat lagi karena kategorinya combine, jadi saya harus mempersiapkan di lead dan boulder," ujarnya.
Terkait target, Aries menuturkan dirinya tidak ingin muluk-muluk sama seperti ketika ia membuat kejutan dengan merebut emas sekaligus memecahkan rekor dunia pada IFSc World Cup Xiamen 2019. Begitu pun dengan kompetisi kali ini, ia hanya akan fokus menjalani apa yang sedang dihadapinya di depan mata.
Lebih lanjut, Aries menyatakan dirinya tidak akan turun pada Kejuaraan Panjat Tebing Asia di Stadion Pakansari 6-10 November. Hal tersebut dikarenakan saat ini, atlet peringkat tiga dunia itu tengah fokus mempersiapkan diri menghadapi pra-kualifikasi dan pemulihan akibat cedera.
Selain Aries, rekan sesama atlet pelatnas panjat tebing Alfian M. Fajri juga akan mengikuti kompetisi pra-kualifikasi tersebut. Alfian sebelumnya menjadi juara dunia nomor speed world record sekaligus meraih medali emas pada IFSC World Cup Chamonix, Prancis pada Juli lalu.
text:
Rock Climbing: Aries Susanti Prepares for the Olympic Pre Qualification
05 Nov 2019, 16:55 by Antara, Ariandono
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Indonesian women's rock climbing athlete Aries Susanti Rahayu is preparing to take part in the Tokyo 2020 Olympic pre-qualification championship in Toulouse, France on 25 November.
Although he is still recovering from a finger injury he has suffered since last October, Aries said he will continue to perform as much as possible in pre-qualification later.
"Actually, just yesterday's championship (in Xiamen, China), it was already injured. But if the championship is up to it, leave it," said the woman who was nicknamed the spiderwoman in Jakarta on Tuesday.
In preparing for this pre-qualification, Aries said he had to train harder, especially in the championship this time it would be to compete with the combination of speed, lead and boulder, the same as that which will be competed at the Tokyo 2020 Olympics.
"Certainly, the training will still be the same as yesterday, but it will only be more active because the category combines, so I have to prepare for leads and boulder," he said.
Regarding the target, Aries said that he did not want to be as grandiose as when he made a surprise by winning gold while breaking the world record at the IFSc World Cup Xiamen 2019. Likewise with this competition, he would only focus on what he was facing before his eyes. .
Furthermore, Aries said he would not go down at the Asian Rock Climbing Championship at the Pakansari Stadium November 6-10. That is because at present, the world number three athlete is focusing on preparing to face pre-qualification and recovery due to injury.
In addition to Aries, fellow national athletes from rock climbing Alfian M. Fajri will also take part in the pre-qualification competition. Alfian previously won the world speed speed record number at the same time won a gold medal at the IFSC World Cup Chamonix, France in July.
